Please!"},{"lineNumber":112054,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私にシュークリームの作り方を","translatedEnglishLine":"Teach me how to make cream puffs."},{"lineNumber":112055,"originalJapaneseLine":"　教えてくだされー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Please teach me!"},{"lineNumber":112056,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああもう！　なんですの、あなたは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh geez! What is with you!"},{"lineNumber":112057,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私にご指導ご鞭撻をーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Give me your guidance and encouragement!"},{"lineNumber":112058,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お菓子は作りません！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I do not make sweets!!!!"},{"lineNumber":112059,"originalJapaneseLine":"饅頭君ことサムソンは、","translatedEnglishLine":"Manju-kun, also known as Samson,"},{"lineNumber":112060,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザスの剣士、チルディに","translatedEnglishLine":"was taught by Childi, the swordsman of Leazas,"},{"lineNumber":112061,"originalJapaneseLine":"シュークリームの作り方を教わった。","translatedEnglishLine":"how to make cream puffs."},{"lineNumber":112062,"originalJapaneseLine":"「命の限り、戦いましょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let’s fight to the very end of our lives."},{"lineNumber":112063,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今日はカラーのアカシロって子を呼んだぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Today I’ve called a girl named Akashiro from Kal."},{"lineNumber":112064,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス総統、失礼いたします」","translatedEnglishLine":"Supreme Commander Rance, excuse me."},{"lineNumber":112065,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しつれいいたしまーす！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Excuse me!"},{"lineNumber":112066,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれ？　なんだ、リセットまで」","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh? What, even Reset?"},{"lineNumber":112067,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……","translatedEnglishLine":"Hah..."},{"lineNumber":112068,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私が呼ばれていると聞くと、","translatedEnglishLine":"When she hears that I’m called, she insists on going too."},{"lineNumber":112069,"originalJapaneseLine":"　自分も絶対に行く、と」","translatedEnglishLine":"She absolutely has to go."},{"lineNumber":112070,"originalJapaneseLine":"「君達、仲良し？」","translatedEnglishLine":"You two are close?"},{"lineNumber":112071,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、なかよしだよー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yeah, we're good friends."},{"lineNumber":112072,"originalJapaneseLine":"「仲良し、というか……","translatedEnglishLine":"Close friends, or rather..."},{"lineNumber":112073,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私は姫様――リセット様の乳母兼護衛役です」","translatedEnglishLine":"I am the wet nurse and bodyguard of the princess, Lady Reset."},{"lineNumber":112074,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほう、乳母。","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, a wet nurse."},{"lineNumber":112075,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そうか、そういう奴も中にはいるか」","translatedEnglishLine":"I see, so there are people like that among you."},{"lineNumber":112076,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、以前より父親である、","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, I have long wished to greet my father,"},{"lineNumber":112077,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス総統にはご挨拶を、と思っていました。","translatedEnglishLine":"Supreme Commander Rance. I am grateful for this opportunity."},{"lineNumber":112078,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こういった機会を頂けたことを感謝します」","translatedEnglishLine":"I appreciate being given an occasion like this."},{"lineNumber":112079,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あー、うんうん」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, yeah yeah."},{"lineNumber":112080,"originalJapaneseLine":"（う〜〜ん……","translatedEnglishLine":"(Hmm..."},{"lineNumber":112081,"originalJapaneseLine":"　可愛いければ襲おうかと思ったが……）","translatedEnglishLine":"If she was cute, I thought about attacking her..."},{"lineNumber":112082,"originalJapaneseLine":"（近くにリセットがいるとなると、な……）","translatedEnglishLine":"But with Reset nearby..."},{"lineNumber":112083,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ま、いい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, it's fine."},{"lineNumber":112084,"originalJapaneseLine":"　チャンスが今日だけというわけじゃあるまいし、","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s not like today’s the only chance,"},{"lineNumber":112085,"originalJapaneseLine":"　また次の機会にするか）","translatedEnglishLine":"so I’ll wait for another opportunity.)"},{"lineNumber":112086,"originalJapaneseLine":"（うむ、我慢も次の機会を楽しむ為の","translatedEnglishLine":"(Yes, patience is an essence to enjoy the next opportunity,"},{"lineNumber":112087,"originalJapaneseLine":"　エッセンスなのだ、俺って大人だなぁ）","translatedEnglishLine":"I am such an adult.)"},{"lineNumber":112088,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これで終わりですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is that all?"},{"lineNumber":112089,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、戻っていいぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, you may return."},{"lineNumber":112090,"originalJapaneseLine":"「では、私から、部下ではなく、","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, from me, not as a subordinate,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ご指導ご鞭撻を頂きたいものだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I would like to receive your guidance and encouragement.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむうむ、武に優れた者は世界中に沢山いる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm hmm, there are many who excel in martial arts all over the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスの方々にも一度稽古をつけて頂くのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It might not be bad to have the people of Leazas train once.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪くないかも知れぬな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It could possibly be a good idea...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よう、饅頭君」
「サムソンです」
「本日のお饅頭は塩饅頭にしてみました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today's manjū I tried making salted manjū.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 塩気があんこの甘みを引き立ててくれるかと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought the saltiness would enhance the sweetness of the red bean paste.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「饅頭いらん。飽きた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't want manjū. I'm tired of it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ってわけでやっぱお前クビ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That being the case, you're fired after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんとーーーーーーー！？」
サムソンはクビになった。
「しょ、少々お待ち下さい！
そのようなことを仰らずに！」
「毎週饅頭食わされる身にもなってみろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Put yourself in the shoes of someone who has to eat manjū every week.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 体があんこ臭くなりそうだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My body feels like it’s going to start smelling like red bean paste.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そんな！
作れと仰ったのは総統なのに！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You were the one who told me to make them, Supreme Commander!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たまにはシュークリームとか持ってこい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bring something like cream puffs once in a while.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気の利かん奴め」
「あわわわ……」
「チルディ殿ー！　どうか！
私にシュークリームの作り方を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Teach me how to make cream puffs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 教えてくだされー！」
「ああもう！　なんですの、あなたは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh geez! What is with you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私にご指導ご鞭撻をーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Give me your guidance and encouragement!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お菓子は作りません！！！！」
饅頭君ことサムソンは、
リーザスの剣士、チルディに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was taught by Childi, the swordsman of Leazas,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シュークリームの作り方を教わった。
「命の限り、戦いましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let’s fight to the very end of our lives.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日はカラーのアカシロって子を呼んだぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today I’ve called a girl named Akashiro from Kal.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス総統、失礼いたします」
「しつれいいたしまーす！」
「あれ？　なんだ、リセットまで」
「はあ……
私が呼ばれていると聞くと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When she hears that I’m called, she insists on going too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分も絶対に行く、と」
「君達、仲良し？」
「うん、なかよしだよー」
「仲良し、というか……
私は姫様――リセット様の乳母兼護衛役です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am the wet nurse and bodyguard of the princess, Lady Reset.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう、乳母。
そうか、そういう奴も中にはいるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, so there are people like that among you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、以前より父親である、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, I have long wished to greet my father,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス総統にはご挨拶を、と思っていました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Supreme Commander Rance. I am grateful for this opportunity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こういった機会を頂けたことを感謝します」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I appreciate being given an occasion like this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あー、うんうん」
可愛いければ襲おうかと思ったが……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If she was cute, I thought about attacking her...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （近くにリセットがいるとなると、な……）
（ま、いい。
チャンスが今日だけというわけじゃあるまいし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s not like today’s the only chance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また次の機会にするか）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I’ll wait for another opportunity.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （うむ、我慢も次の機会を楽しむ為の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Yes, patience is an essence to enjoy the next opportunity,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エッセンスなのだ、俺って大人だなぁ）
「これで終わりですか？」
「うむ、戻っていいぞ」
「では、私から、部下ではなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, from me, not as a subordinate,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

私は姫様――リセット様の乳母兼護衛役です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am the wet nurse and bodyguard of the princess, Lady Reset.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう、乳母。
そうか、そういう奴も中にはいるか」

可愛いければ襲おうかと思ったが……）
